text: Zvi Arad (16 April 1942 - 4 February 2018) was an Israeli mathematician. He was born in Tel Aviv. He served as President of Netanya Academic College from 1994 until his death in 2018.For 11-year-old Math Prodigy, 2 Plus 2 Equals 'Super-gifted' In 2000 his book was published in the series American Mathematical Society Memoirs and in January 2002 another book on table algebras was published in the international publication. Arad died in Petah Tikva, Israel on 4 February 2018 at the age of 75.Professor Zvi Arad passes away ==References== ==Other websites== *Profile Netanya Academic College *Zvi Arad Dun's 100 Category:2018 deaths Category:1942 births Category:Israeli academics Category:Israeli mathematicians Category:Scientists from Tel Aviv
title: Zvi Arad
